Package BrickDestroy.JavaFX_SceneController

Class JavaFXGameBoardController

java.lang.Object
BrickDestroy.JavaFX_SceneController.GameBoardController
public class JavaFXGameBoardController extends Object
Controls the game board where the game is taking place. Player is allowed to pause, move Player, open debug dialog, open pause menu, restart an exit. Once the player completes a level, a score board with the high scores is listed. Once the player completes the game or loses all the ball, they are transferred to the end game to show their final score and a list of high scores.

    • lostABall

      private void lostABall()
      Invoked when the player loses a ball. It resets the location of the ball and player to their default location.

    • completedALevel

      private void completedALevel()
      Invoked when the player completes a level. It removes the bricks from the screen and instead add the new bricks of the next level to the screen.

    • removeLevelBricksFromGameBoard

      private void removeLevelBricksFromGameBoard()
      Removes the bricks of the current level from the screen.

      Parameters:
      highScoreManager - current high score manager
